column1: Uchi////- Dessert - The tasting comes with one dessert
column2: but upon telling our waiter that we did not enjoy the pork dish
column3: he brought us two desserts.  The first was very unique (cantaloupe sherbet with buttermilk foam) - good flavor
column4: but not something I would need to try again.  The second was peanut butter semifreddo
column5: which is deconstructed peanut butter and jelly.  If you eat all the components together it really does taste like a true PB&J.  I recommend trying this if this is not your tasting dessert.
